original_title: 地味だけど実は肉食な幼なじみと5日間の食べられ同棲生活 琴音華
overview: [Limited quantity of 30] I have a childhood friend who is a classmate. But recently, we haven't talked at all, but while my parents and Hana-chan's parents are going on a trip, we're going to stay at my house together... Then it turns out that she was a ridiculous carnivorous slut even though she looks like a quiet person. Saying that she can't sleep alone because she's too scared to sleep, she comes into the futon with a spear. I was pulled out for 5 days.
title: Five Days Living Together With Plain But Truly Carnivorous Childhood Friend!
